data.name: Demons Roots
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989450/Public_Defense_Corp_The_Ambassador_of_Peace/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1410980/Serafina_and_the_Key_to_the_Egg/


Upcoming Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724320/Noelle_Does_Her_Best/


About the Game

In a world where the winners attain happiness through the blood and tears of the defeated, and where the losers become servants of the victors.

For many, revolution is but a dream. The defeated can never be saved in this empire of tyrannical rule.

However, a group of demons who were sealed for a thousand years plan to rise up and struggle against this unjust world.

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Skill System
  • Multiple Party Members
data.about_the_game:
In a world where the winners attain happiness through the blood and tears of the defeated, and where the losers become servants of the victors.

For many, revolution is but a dream. The defeated can never be saved in this empire of tyrannical rule.

However, a group of demons who were sealed for a thousand years plan to rise up and struggle against this unjust world.

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Skill System
  • Multiple Party Members
data.short_description: A thousand years after they were sealed into the world of darkness, demons are now on the verge of extinction. To struggle for survival, they challenge the human world to a final battle...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
